long_description: The 1-liter Esbit Food Jug is a convenient way to enjoy a hot meal or beverage in the woods or at the office. The vacuum-sealed jug preserves heat for hours and the wide opening makes serving easy. Double-walled construction with high-quality stainless steel; silver-coated inner body for superior insulation and heat preservation. Tests show that a jug filled with 208degF water in a 68degF room will have a temperature greater than 145degF after 6 hrs. and greater than 110degF after 12 hrs. The 1-liter Esbit Food Jug has a push button for pressure release and the lid serves as a bowl. Overstock.
short_description: The 1-liter Esbit Food Jug is a convenient way to enjoy a hot meal or beverage in the woods or at the office. The vacuum-sealed jug preserves heat for hours and the wide opening makes serving easy.
